displaytitle: Latimer Preaching at Paul's Cross (final composition with key numbers)
medium: Lithograph on heavy wove white paper
creditline: Gift of George L. Small, Class of 1943
inscribed:
Inscribed in stone, lower left: Sir George Hayter pinxit - et Delt
Inscribed in stone, lower right: Litg. by W. Harring
TItled in ink, lower center: Latimer Preaching at / Paul's Cross 1553
